welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ulstein, Norway! Prepare to be enchanted by our charming city known for its vibrant culture and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hovden Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hovden Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vigra Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vigra Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
